title: Ep 5: Up In the Air with Shirley Braha
itunes:title: Ep 5: Up In the Air with Shirley Braha
itunes:subtitle: Doree discusses self-care while traveling, including her #1 travel must-have, while Kate starts the Whole Life Challenge and buys a "mini-muffin-sized" jar of La Mer with a gift card. Plus, they talk to Shirley Braha, aka the mom of Marnie th...
description:
Doree discusses self-care while traveling, including her #1 travel must-have, while Kate starts the Whole Life Challenge and buys a "mini-muffin-sized" jar of La Mer with a gift card. Plus, they talk to Shirley Braha, aka the mom of Marnie the Dog, about playing the piano for an hour a day and investing in cryptocurrency!

For more info on the products mentioned on this week's episode, visit www.forever35podcast.com. You can also join the Forever35 Facebook group at www.facebook.com/groups/forever35podcast, follow the podcast on Instagram at @forever35podcast and on Twitter at @forever35pod, and email Kate and Doree at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

This episode is sponsored by Tripping.com. Visit tripping.com/forever35 to find your perfect vacation rental!

Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
